title: European Football Analytics | 2024–25
description: Analyzed match outcomes, goals, home vs away performance, and trends across 6 top European football leagues during the 2024–2025 season. Built interactive dashboards with KPIs, slicers, and visual analytics.
insights: Home teams win significantly more matches than away teams across all leagues
Premier League shows the highest average goals per match
Goal scoring tends to increase in the second half of the season
Draw rate is higher in defensive leagues like Serie A

title: Pizza Sales Performance Analysis
description: End-to-end sales analysis of a pizza restaurant to evaluate revenue performance, customer ordering behavior, best and worst-selling pizzas, and peak sales periods. SQL was used for data extraction and validation, while Power BI was used for visualization and business insights.
insights: Thai Chicken Pizza generates the highest revenue despite not being the top-selling by quantity
Classic Deluxe Pizza leads in total orders and quantities sold
Friday evenings and weekends show peak order volume
Large-size pizzas contribute the highest share of total sales
Brie Carre Pizza consistently underperforms across revenue, quantity, and orders
